summary: Adds new texture variations for werewolf form in HD. Includes Body and eyes textures.
descriptionHtml:
Adds new texture variations for werewolf form in HD. Includes Body and eyes textures.

I recomend using a model from Tales Of Lycanthropy - Werewolf Overhaul.
That Way Your beast form will look like mine in the screenshots.
Under files, called: 02 New werewolf model and textures - The Howling 
Install any of my textures last if you want same results!

THEIR MOD IS NOT INCLUDED HERE!

You will find it here: 
                               http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12687


Create Your Own Werewolf Look.

Choose from 6 different body textures and 7 different eye colors.

How To Install:
1.) Unrar the file
2.) Choose from two folders:
 
                          -Werewolf Eyes Textures
                          -Werewolf Textures
3.) Inside those two folders you will find different retextures:

                          -for example if you want \'\'Werewolf Black & Brown\'\'
                          Open that folder and copy the \'\'Data\'\' folder inside 
                           to your //\'\'The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\'\' folder and Overwrite
                          Same goes for eye textures!

4.)Your Path Should look something like this: 
    
   //The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\eyes
   //The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\werewolf

Enjoy! :D
author: ThorTheViking
